title: The Frog Prince's Daughters
description: Anura is a fairytale princess whose prince won’t come. When a fireball-wielding wizard shows up instead and makes a determined effort to murder her, her stubborn cousin Rana decides it’s time to make the prince come, any way she can.But the wizard hasn’t given up — and he’s got more in mind than just murder…Note: republished as Wild Imperative (Book 1 of the Domain trilogy).
author: Wendy Palmer
